description:
Made of 80 % acrylic and 20 % wool, it provides insulation for cooler weather. The ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem add comfort and classic touch. With a YKK® metal zipper and two knitted welt pockets, it combines convenience and style.

Experience the allure of heritage style with our Northern Cardigan Sweater—a cozy and timeless addition to your wardrobe.
name: Hooke Northern Cardigan Sweater - Mens
